participant_1.background:
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
I'm small, but I stand out in a crowd because I love wearing leather.
Football is my main focus, and I need to look my best to be successful.
my boyfriend is unemployed.
i like doing art projects.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my ability to play the bass and make music that connects with people.
I immerse myself in the smell of my favorite soap to find solace.
My hardest decision was whether to give up my lasagna addiction or travel to the UK.
i am constantly making short films with the camcorder my parents got me.
I lost my childhood dog when I was 10.

content.text: Hey there, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to make music with the bass! It's so much fun to make music that connects with people.
Oh wow, that's awesome! I'm not really musical, but I love listening to music.
I like a lot of different genres, but I'm really into indie pop and rock right now.
Oh cool! I like those genres too. I'm also really into hip hop.
Oh yeah, hip hop is great too! I love the beats and the flow.
Me too! It's so much fun to dance to.
Yeah, it is! I love going to concerts.
Me too! I've been to a few this year.
Oh yeah? What were they like?
They were amazing! I saw Tame Impala and The Strokes.
Oh wow, I love Tame Impala! I've seen them live twice.
Really? That's awesome! They're so good live.
Yeah, they are! I'm so glad I got to see them.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
I see. Well, it was nice talking to you! Have a good day!
You too! Nice talking to you too!
